body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

From a [customer report](https://community.temporal.io/t/cant-connect-to-elasticsearch-over-ssl/215?u=markmark) (thank you, Kyle!)

"I’m not able to connect to elasticsearch over https. The temporal helm chart has a property for scheme which makes it seem like https would be supported, but my services won’t start up because they hang on wait_for_es in the start script.

Looking at how the client is created in temporal I think https would probably work there, but looking in start.sh I see that http is hard coded in some places..."


**Describe the solution you'd like**
Setting elasticsearch scheme to https should work as expected (temporal should be able to connect to ES over https). https://github.com/temporalio/helm-charts/blob/master/values/values.elasticsearch.yaml#L6

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

**Additional context**

comments.body: I think this is now done, will revisit if we get any community feedback on this.

title: Allow for https connections to elasticsearch
